# An example of the review

Writing lists are not recommended for reviews. The better choice is to use table as an alternative.

| Num |  | Positive review |
| :------ | :-----: | :--------- | 
| ① | ➕ | Good **game** design. |
| ② | ➕ | Good *music*. |
| ③ | ➕ | Good <u>story</u>. |

| Num |  | Negative review |
| :------ | :-----: | :--------- | 
| ① | ➖ | Bad art. |
| ② | ➖ | No localization. |
| ③ | ➖ | High price. |

# Point 1: Game design

> A game design is always important.

The game's good design makes me recall the experience in Hollow Knight.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/367520/Hollow_Knight/
